```{r, include=FALSE}
library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")
source("chart_functions.R")

pillars_conn <- connect_to_db("rjs_pillars")

meta<-dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM metadata_race_labels")

pop<-dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM report_stoprates_ficard_race_pop_person") 
  
  
df<-pop%>%
  filter(race !="aian" & race !="nhpi")%>%
  left_join(meta, by=c("race"="race_base"))%>%
  arrange(-rate)

# pop denominator--------

# TITLE 
title_text <- paste0("SDPD disproportionately conducts field interviews for Black people living in San Diego")

# SUBTITLE
subtitle_text <- paste0("Number of stops of people with field interview cards per 1K people of the same race")

# METHOD NOTE
methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated stops resulting in a field interview card only."

# CREATE CAPTION
## create caption
caption_text <- paste("<br><br>", racenote, sourcenote, methodnote)

# TOOLTIP
tooltip_text <- "Out of 1,000 <b>{point.race_label_short:.0f}</b> people in San Diego, <b>{point.rate:.1f}</b>  people perceived as <b>{point.race_label_short:.0f}</b> were stopped for an officer-initiated stop that resulted in a field interview card"

chart <- fx_bubblepopchart(
  df=df,
  x='race_label_short', # format for your data frame
  y='rate', # format for your data frame
  z='count', # format for your data frame
  top_finding=title_text,
  subtitle= subtitle_text,
  tooltip_text=tooltip_text,
  caption = caption_text,
  yaxis_label = "''", # format for your y axis labels
  export_data_label=list(pointFormat='{point.rate:.1f} per 1K') # format for your data
) 



dbDisconnect(pillars_conn)

```
